title: TastySpots
description:
TastySpots is a free and exclusive social platform dedicated for avid foodies to explore popular and authentic food spots that provides a unique food experience for your taste buds. Unlike a usual directory of maximum number of restaurants, TastySpots provides you a curated collection of restaurants that you can depend on. We try to enhance your food experience with rich media content exclusively produced by TastySpots team who personally visit and evaluate each restaurant.
Sign in for a delightful experience and tantalize your taste buds. Together we can search, eat and share our experiences, which will help the world to make the choice in this never ending voyage to find the right tasty spot.
Features
*Find the Popular, Unique, Authentic or Best Restaurants
*Recommended Dishes with Photo,Description and Rating
*Watch Exclusive Videos and Photographs of Each Restaurant
*Red Detailed Write-up about Each Restaurant, Timing, Cuisines and Other Details
*Food, Ambiance and Service Ratings
*Use Nearby, Open Now and Veg Only, Cuisine Filters to Find the Restaurants thats suits you best
*Create Food Profile, Post Rating and Reviews for Restaurants and Dishes
*Upload Photos
